headline: Johnson And Johnson Faces Fresh Talc Verdict As Pipeline Story Evolves
summary: Philadelphia jury orders Johnson & Johnson to pay damages in a talc related ovarian cancer case, the first plaintiff win there since litigation restarted. Verdict comes after prior bankruptcy efforts to contain tens of thousands of talc lawsuits were halted, putting fresh focus on product liability risk. Bayer files a separate lawsuit over Johnson & Johnson prostate cancer drug marketing practices. Company reports recent R&D milestones in oncology and autoimmune disease treatments. For...
